snippet: A photograph in a North Korean newspaper of Kim Jong-un’s younger sister wearing what may be a wedding ring has prompted suggestions that she recently married the son of one of Mr. Kim’s close aides.
lead_paragraph: A photograph in a North Korean newspaper of Kim Jong-un’s younger sister wearing what may be a wedding ring has prompted suggestions that she recently married the son of one of Mr. Kim’s close aides.

headline.main: A Ring Sparks Speculation That North Korean Leader’s Sister Has Married
headline.print_headline: A Ring Sparks Speculation That North Korean Leader’s Sister Has Married
